properties.applicationDescription: This project aims to cover best practices for Java application development as a whole. It provides tool recommendations for linting, testing and packaging.
properties.applicationLicenseComment: This is a lax, permissive non-copyleft free software license, compatible with the GNU GPL.

configuration.preparationGoals: clean package site:site resources:copy-resources@prepare antrun:run@prepare scm:checkin@prepare
